dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: Those girls have been giving me dirty looks ever since I got here. Did I do something wrong?

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: Ah, I see you've noticed my darling fellow schoolmates.

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: I've gotten quite the flock of dedicated fans here.

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: It's only natural when you're the most popular individual in your school.

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: Looks like they're all jealous of you, being able to pique my interest so quickly.

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: They'd kill to just spend one fleeting moment with me. Unfortunately, they're just not worth my time. Ahahah~

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: That's... hmm...

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: You must have your own little fanbase where you come from, no?

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: Some people say I do, but personally it feels like everything I did back at my school went completely under the radar.

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: I never set out to be popular, though. I just wanted to share my passions with anyone who wanted to listen.

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: And thanks to that, I met my amazing group of friends...

dialogue.name: showbackgroundimage
dialogue.string: flashback1

dialogue.name: showbackgroundimage
dialogue.string: ending2

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: -agh!

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: (Did I just see-)

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: (But why..?)

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: You're doing that thing again, Monika. You know you can always tell me whatever's the matter.

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: I-I'm ok... I'm ok!

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: There's no need to worry about me, ahaha-

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: Ah, if you insist.

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: In that case, I'd like to know more about where you're from. You continue to intrigue me with each conversation.

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: I can try my best to do that, yeah.

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: (Is something happening that's causing these effects?)

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: (The game barely kept itself together when everyone wasn't there.)

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: (If something goes wrong-)
